dhp235:2: te → taṁ (bj, sya-all, km, pts1ed, pts2ed)
dhp236:4: Dibbaṁ ariyabhūmiṁ upehisi → dibbaṁ ariyabhūmimehisi (bj, sya-all, pts1ed, pts2ed); dibbamariyabhūmiṁ upehisi (?)
dhp238:4: Na punaṁ jātijaraṁ → na puna jātijaraṁ (bj, sya-all); na puna jātijjaraṁ (mr)
dhp249:3: Tattha yo ca maṅku bhavati → tattha ce maṅku yo hoti (bj); tattha yo maṅkuto hoti (sya-all); tattha yo maṅku hoti (pts1ed); tattha yo maṅku bhavati (pts2ed)
